annotations.description: This eye catching cocktail is served in a hollow ice sphere and today I'm showing you how to make it at home and impress your guests! #DIY #flamingcocktail #...
annotations.title: DIY FLAMING Ice Ball Cocktail - How to make eye catching cocktails

textContent:
1.5 oz gin
0.75 oz Fresh lime juice
0.5 oz Simple syrup
0.5 oz Green Chartreuse
1 Rosemary sprig

Shake gin, lime, and simple syrup. 
Put Chartreuse and Rosemary into glass and light on fire. 
Open pour shaker into glass to extinguish flame

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0JoDKCEK4T8
title: Flaming Rosemary Gimmlet
